overview:
Trevor Ward, our General Manager of EMEA, is focused on maximizing our customers’ success and growing our sales, services, and partner capabilities in Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. “I believe in the value of building relationships,” says Trevor. “Therefore, I spend as much time as possible in the field with our customers and partners discussing Work Management and how AtTask can improve people’s work and their work-lives.”

Trevor has an academic background in Electronic Engineering and is no stranger to the software industry. He has spent more than twenty years in leadership positions at organizations like IntraLinks, Adobe Systems, Microsoft, and Lotus Development, and was most recently Vice President of UK and Ireland for IntraLinks.

True to the customs of the United Kingdom, Trevor and his family live and breathe football (soccer). Or, as he would put it, “We are football mad!” He and the family are season ticket holders at the Reading FC stadium and his sons play for the Reading FC Youth Academy and Clubs Development Centre. Outside of work and watching football, Trevor keeps himself busy with healthy hobbies in running and coaching. He also likes getting his hands greasy working on motorcycles and cars in his garage.
